titleStmt.title: In parishes of about an hundred families, and wherein the registry of the births, burials, and marriages hath been well kept, enquire, 1. The number of the inhabitants, male and female. 2. Married and unmarried, and their trades. 3. Widdows and widdowers. 4. The age of each person, man, woman, and child. 5. The number of families and hearths. As in the following scheme, viz.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
